I'd like to allow also non-superadmins to connect my application with theri HubSpot instances.

Yes, you should use `optional_scope` param for anything that is non-essential to your app. Then request the proper scope based on user / super admin (generally requires an app update to make this flow work).

If you send a user to the connect screen with a set of scopes they don't have, they don't be able to connect. `optional_scope` will make it so they can connect, but they won't have that access
